bibl.title: Octavian / Augustus als Soter, Euergetes und Epiphanes: Die Datierung des Kalabscha-Tores. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: The stones of the Kalabsha-Gate, re-erected in the Museum Berlin-Charlottenburg (1977), dates to the earliest period of Octavianus' reign. He added Ptolemaic epithets (in hieroglyphic forms of writing) to the name of Octavianus / Augustus and tried to establish a continuity between his reign and the Ptolemaic Dynasty.
bibl.seg: WINTER Erich, Octavian / Augustus als Soter, Euergetes und Epiphanes: Die Datierung des Kalabscha-Tores. Avec résumé en anglais.
ZÄS 130 (2003) pp. 197-212, 4 figg. et pll. XLVI-LI.

The stones of the Kalabsha-Gate, re-erected in the Museum Berlin-Charlottenburg (1977), dates to the earliest period of Octavianus' reign. He added Ptolemaic epithets (in hieroglyphic forms of writing) to the name of Octavianus / Augustus and tried to establish a continuity between his reign and the Ptolemaic Dynasty.
